Виртуальный музей архитектуры – это прое: Virtual museum of architecture is a project of Shchusev Museum of Architecture. It is being realized on the initiative and with the support of the Ministry of Culture of the Russian Federation
Архитектура как особый вид искусства нуж: Architecture as a particular art form requires special and contemporary representation methods. Web portal and 3D excursions are the new, hi-tech and adequate form of presentation of the architecture. The history of the creation of selected buildings in drawings, layouts and models, as well as design documents of the nonbuilt constructions, photos and measurement plans of lost buildings let the audience to visualize the evolution of national architecture.
Кроме того, виртуальный режим бытования: Besides that, the virtual mode of the existence of museum specimens (graphics, historical photos) and of modern architectural shootings of the extant buildings, may help the non-specialist audience to see and to estimate the main memorials and achievements of the Russian architecture. So, every web user, to whom the access to the unique collection of the Museum of architecture is difficult, be this user from a Russian city or from abroad, may not only get acquainted to the main stages of the Russian architecture evolution, but also to make his own selection of objects and pictures, sorting them by several parameters – style, time, architect and place of construction.
Виртуальный музей архитектуры, снабженны: Virtual museum of architecture supplied with scientific texts, descriptions and annotations becomes a unique resource for historical studies of national architecture. It is progressive, mobile and easy-to-access.
Для правильного воспроизведения моделей: You need to install the Unity Player to view the model.
